data.message: We want to support our innocent civilans who killed in terror attack in Ankara yesterday, with facebook Turkish flag application. Terror attacks do not only happen in Europe or USA but also happens in other countries. It would be great to see facebook's and other people's support to overcome these days and terrorism. Thanks.

replies.message: It's been a week and still no answer. Thanks facebook worker whoever answering these opinions for IGNORING us. That's not acceptable and not nice. #facebook #markzuckerberg
